# portkey_workspace_member (Resource)

Manages a Portkey workspace member. Assigns users to workspaces with specific roles.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `role` (String) Role of the user in the workspace (e.g., 'admin', 'member', 'manager').
- `user_id` (String) ID of the user to add to the workspace.
- `workspace_id` (String) ID of the workspace.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when the member was added to the workspace.
- `id` (String) Workspace member identifier.
